testcase.name: testOnErrorDoesNotCrash

error.message:
Mockito cannot mock this class: class com.example.controller.NBodyEndpointTest$1.
If you're not sure why you're getting this error, please open an issue on GitHub.
Java : 23 JVM vendor name : Homebrew JVM vendor version : 23.0.1 JVM name : OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM JVM version : 23.0.1 JVM info : mixed mode, sharing OS name : Mac OS X OS version : 15.3.1
You are seeing this disclaimer because Mockito is configured to create inlined mocks. You can learn about inline mocks and their limitations under item #39 of the Mockito class javadoc.
Underlying exception : org.mockito.exceptions.base.MockitoException: Could not modify all classes [class com.example.controller.NBodyEndpointTest$1, interface java.lang.AutoCloseable, interface javax.websocket.Session, interface java.io.Closeable, class java.lang.Object]

testcase.name: testOnCloseRemovesSession

error.message:
Mockito cannot mock this class: class com.example.controller.NBodyEndpointTest$1.
If you're not sure why you're getting this error, please open an issue on GitHub.
Java : 23 JVM vendor name : Homebrew JVM vendor version : 23.0.1 JVM name : OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM JVM version : 23.0.1 JVM info : mixed mode, sharing OS name : Mac OS X OS version : 15.3.1
You are seeing this disclaimer because Mockito is configured to create inlined mocks. You can learn about inline mocks and their limitations under item #39 of the Mockito class javadoc.
